scheme_data.schemeName: Assistance For Purchase Of Spectacles By A Differently Abled Person
scheme_data.shortDescription: {"id": "tAyLHI0BvvukECfi8urF", "fields": {"beneficiaryState": ["Tamil Nadu"], "schemeShortTitle": "Apsdap", "level": "State", "nodalMinistryName": null, "schemeCategory": ["Social welfare & Empowerment"], "schemeName": "Assistance For Purchase Of Spectacles By A Differently Abled Person", "schemeCloseDate": null, "slug": "apsdap", "briefDescription": "The \"Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles by A Differently Abled Persons\" scheme in Tamil Nadu is a government initiative that aims to provide financial assistance to differently-abled individuals.", "age": {"ews": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "sc": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "general": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "obc": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "st": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "female": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "widowed": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}}, "tags": ["Differently Abled Persons", "Spectacles", "Tamil Nadu"]}, "highlight": {}}
scheme_data.description:
The name of this welfare scheme is Assistance For Purchase Of Spectacles By A Differently Abled Person. It is also known as Apsdap. The "Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles by A Differently Abled Persons" scheme in Tamil Nadu is a government initiative that aims to provide financial assistance to differently-abled individuals.
A sum of Rs.500/- (Rupees Five hundred only) is paid as assistance towards the reimbursement of the cost of spectacles for differently-abled persons. The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual. It is specifically implemented in Tamil Nadu. Additionally, the nodal department is Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department.

The scheme provides the following benefits: A sum of Rs.500/(Rupees Five hundred only) is paid as an assistance towards the reimbursement of the cost of spectacles for differentlyabled persons.

Eligibility criteria include: Differentlyabled persons holding identity cards issued by the welfare board for the differently abled. The application process is as follows: Step 1: Visit the official website of the Chennai district.
Step 2: Click on the Departments. Select Differently Abled Welfare, after selecting click on Differently Abled Welfare Schemes. 
Step 3: You will land on the List of Scheme page of Differently Abled Welfare Schemes.
Step 4: Scroll down to the section "L. Tamilnadu differently abled welfare board schemes". 
Step 5: Download the application form of the "S.No. 7 Reimbursement for purchase of spectacles for visually impaired persons  Rs. 500".


Note: The application is to be submitted District Differently Abled Welfare Officer. For more information, please refer to: Guidelines: https://www.scd.tn.gov.in/pdf/schemes/pdf/ASSISTANCE%20FOR%20PURCHASE%20OF%20SPECTACLES%20BY%20A%20DIFFERENTLY.pdf Tags associated with the scheme include: Differently Abled Persons, Spectacles, Tamil Nadu.

It is also known as Apsdap.
The "Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles by A Differently Abled Persons" scheme in Tamil Nadu is a government initiative that aims to provide financial assistance to differently-abled individuals.
500/- (Rupees Five hundred only) is paid as assistance towards the reimbursement of the cost of spectacles for differently-abled persons.
The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual.
It is specifically implemented in Tamil Nadu.
Additionally, the nodal department is Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department.
The scheme provides the following benefits: A sum of Rs.
500/(Rupees Five hundred only) is paid as an assistance towards the reimbursement of the cost of spectacles for differentlyabled persons.
Eligibility criteria include: Differentlyabled persons holding identity cards issued by the welfare board for the differently abled.
The application process is as follows: Step 1: Visit the official website of the Chennai district.
Select Differently Abled Welfare, after selecting click on Differently Abled Welfare Schemes.
Step 3: You will land on the List of Scheme page of Differently Abled Welfare Schemes.
Step 4: Scroll down to the section "L.
Tamilnadu differently abled welfare board schemes".
Step 5: Download the application form of the "S.
7 Reimbursement for purchase of spectacles for visually impaired persons Rs.
